## RelayedTransactionV2Builder.setInnerTransaction() method

Sets the inner transaction to be used. It has to be already signed and with gasLimit set to 0. These checks are performed on the build() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
setInnerTransaction(transaction: Transaction): RelayedTransactionV2Builder;
```

transaction


</td><td>

[Transaction](sdk-core.transaction.md)


</td><td>

The inner transaction to be used


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[RelayedTransactionV2Builder](sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.md)
